search_results.snippet:
Kwanzaa is a celebration that begins on December 26 th to January 1 st , 
honouring the African heritage in American culture. Kwanzaa is not a religious 
holiday.
search_results.title: Kwanzaa Facts - SoftSchools

question: The name of this American holiday is from the Swahili for "first fruits"
